content: SP-U core bit Premium core bit for coring in prestressed concrete – for all tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster drilling in pre-stressed concrete Extra-durable core bit – engineered to resist breaking when drilling through cables Hilti Equidist technology – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Applications BI quick-release connection end for low power Hilti diamond drilling tools (less than 2.5 kW), Hilti BI shank BL quick-release connection end for high power Hilti diamond drilling tools (more than 2.5 kW), Hilti BL shank BS (1-¼) universal connection end for Hilti and competition diamond drilling tools Core drilling in prestressed concrete Core drilling in hollow-core concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250-CA Base materials: Concrete (prestressed) Drilling Mode: Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250-CA | Base materials | Concrete (prestressed) | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BI (Hilti), BL (Hilti), BS (1-1/4 in) | Working length | 16 in ### ITEMS- 3808607 -
